details.title: Parallel simulation of 3-D turbulent flow through hydraulic machinery
details.abstract: Parallel calculational methods were used to analyze incompressible turbulent flow through hydraulic machinery. Two parallel methods were used to simulate mulate the complex flow field. The space decorrposition method divides vides the computational domain into several sub-ranges. Parallel discrete event simulation divides the whole task into several parts according to their functions. The results were results were corrpared with the serial simulation results and particle image velocimetry (PIV) experimental results. The results give the distribution and configuration guration of the complex vortices and illustrate the effectiveness of the parallel algorithms for numerical simulation of turbulent flows.
